p: Moreover, we noted that pre-incubation of cells with PLEO led to decrease of ROS generation which is due to the presence of terpinen-4-ol and, probably, to synergistic effect of its components. It has been reported that plant phenols can behave as ROS scavengers, metal chelators and enzyme modulators and prevent lipid peroxidation [ 46]. In agreement with our data obtained, pre-treatment of THP-1 cells with P. lentiscus extracts for 24â€¯h strongly inhibited H 2O 2 damage [ 15].
